oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: NBC Bandstand - 1958-12-05 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of NBC Bandstand radio show hosted by Bert Parks, with Skitch Henderson and Dody Goodman. Originally broadcast December 5, 1958, and featuring WSM and Grand Ole Opry musicians to celebrate the 1000th Opry broadcast including announcer Dave Overton, Marvin Hughes and the WSM Orchestra, the Anita Kerr Quartet, Don Gibson, Dottie Dillard, Minnie Pearl, Faron Young, Hank Garland, and the Jordanaires. It is mentioned (in part 2) that KSTP of Minneapolis, MN is celebrating its thirtieth year as an NBC affiliate, and David Stone (former WSM announcer) is noted as the MC of KSTP's Sunset Valley Barn Dance.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dottie Dillard; Dody Goodman; Minnie Pearl; Faron Young
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Bromo Quinine commercial -- Bert Parks talks -- Bert Parks and Dave Overton introduce Dottie Dillard -- Calumet Baking Powder commercial -- Almost Like Being In Love (Dottie Dillard) -- Comedy routine (Bert Parks, Dody Goodman, Skitch Henderson) -- Mogen David Wine commercial -- Comedy routine (Bert Parks, Dody Goodman, Minnie Pearl, Faron Young) -- That's The Way I Feel (Faron Young) -- Bert Parks talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Parks, Bert; Henderson, Skitch, 1918-2005; Goodman, Dody; Overton, Dave; Anita Kerr Quartet; Minnie Pearl; Young, Faron; Jordanaires (Musical group); Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003; Dillard, Dottie; Hughes, Marvin; WSM Orchestra; Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Stone, David P., 1901-1995; Carroll, Madeleine, 1906-1987
